message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm happy to make an offer of $14,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $18,000. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16,000.  This is my final offer, as I'm prepared to buy the product from John for $15,000 if we can't reach an agreement.
